mapper.select:
SELECT m.id AS menuId, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.order_num AS orderNum, m.permission_type AS permissionType, m.menu_path AS menuPath, m.open_way AS openWay, m.component AS component, m.is_frame AS isFrame, m.menu_type as menuType, m.is_enable AS isEnable, m.perms AS perms, m.icon AS icon FROM menu m WHERE m.is_enable = 1 AND m.is_del =0 AND m.id IN
#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
